analysis.description:
ERC20Token.salvageTokensFromContract (/unique_chucks/3/0xc7c03b8a3fc5719066e185ea616e87b88eba44a3.sol#197-207) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20TokenInterface(_tokenAddress).transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc7c03b8a3fc5719066e185ea616e87b88eba44a3.sol#204-207)
